tool_description: The Infosalary API provides salary estimations based on job titles.
name: Infosalary
title: Infosalary

api_list.name: Salary estimation
api_list.description:
Retrieves the estimated salary of a given job_title.

Outputs:
title (string) --> job title matching your query (e.g. "Data Analayst")
average (float) --> average value for all matching salaries, per year, in US dollars (e.g. "68351.2")
std (float) --> the standard deviation value for all matching salaries (e.g. "15370.9")
samples (int) --> the number of matching salaries (e.g. 2057)
